===Etymology===
{{zh-l|檨|soāiⁿ|mango}} + diminutive {{zh-l|仔|á}}. The former is an Austroasiatic substrate loanword; compare Khmer {{m|km|ស្វាយ|tr=svaaj||mango}}, Vietnamese {{m|vi|xoài||mango}}.
